com.amplifyframework.core

Class AmplifyConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amplifyframework.core.AmplifyConfiguration

  • public class AmplifyConfiguration
extends Object
    AmplifyConfiguration parses the configuration from the amplifyconfiguration.json file and stores in the in-memory objects for the different Amplify plugins to use.
